entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
